desc: Blue Fossil Energy (Pty) Ltd. is an integrated commodities, wholesaler and energy resources trader. Bulk Fuel & Lubricant supplier to the Marine, Aviation, Mining, Construction, Agricultural & Public Sector Industries as well as Facilities, Forecourt, Workshops & Fleet. Online Retailer of Liqui Moly & Motul Products.

layout.text: Fuel your business with a reliable, sustainable and compliant energy partner.
